name: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2021
description:
You are a student at Heck Creek University, where your fellow dinosaurs are busy prepping for the End of the World Dance. Engage in witty conversation, go to various classes such as Roaring 101 and Survival 102, and generally have the best senior year ever! Also: probably the last senior year ever.

We hope you like dating sims with dinosaurs. We hope you are into that.



- Five dinosaurs to mingle with! Win your crushes heart!
- Go to dinosaur school! Manage your daily classes during the week!
- Join up with a Dinosaur RPG Party and slay monsters!
- Put on a glorious adaptation of Dinosaur Henry VIII!
